requirements.title: Search filters node palette by name, description, and keywords
requirements.description: Users can type in the palette search box to filter available nodes using fuzzy matching on name, description, and keyword tags

validation.notes: Validates search filtering reduces visible nodes to matches only

requirements.title: Favorite button toggles node favorites for quick access
requirements.description: Users can click the star icon on node cards to add/remove nodes from the favorites section at the top of the palette

validation.notes: Validates favoriting adds node to favorites section and persists across sessions

requirements.title: Category headers expand/collapse to show/hide node groups
requirements.description: Users can click category headers to expand or collapse groups of related nodes for better organization

validation.notes: Validates category expand/collapse toggles node visibility
